headline: The Best Stocks to Invest $1,000 In Right Now
summary: Alibaba offers a cheap way to invest in artificial intelligence (AI), cloud computing, digital media, and e-commerce.  UnitedHealth Group is a bargain after its steep sell-off.  Vertex Pharmaceuticals has two new drugs on the market and a promising pipeline.
